category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_Hours_Per_Week_Preference
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of work hours per week, as used for calculating calendar end dates. The value can vary depending on the site (e.g 5 days * 8 hours for the US, 5 days * 7.5 hours for the UK). The default value is 40.
